====== DESCRIPTION ======

69th AONE
AONE is a national competition/exhibition highlighting the diversity of work that is currently being made by established and emerging artists.

CURATOR
Bill Carroll, Director of the Studio Program, The Elizabeth Foundation for the Arts.

AWARDS
Best in Show, awards an artist a solo exhibition at Silvermine Arts Center with a $1,000 stipend for show related expenses. The Juror has additional awards to give at their discretion.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Applications through Slideroom https://silvermineart.slideroom.com
